mapper.update: UPDATE hairdresser_info SET name =#{name}, surname =#{surname}, phone =#{phone}, address =#{address}, workingHour =#{workingHour}, uploadImage =#{uploadImage}, storeImage =#{storeImage}, document =#{document}, awards =#{awards} WHERE no = #{no}
mapper.select: select t1.no, t1.name, t1.surname, t1.phone, t1.address, t1.storeImage, t1.profession, GROUP_CONCAT(t2.services) AS services, (t3.score1 + t3.score2 + t3.score3 + t3.score4 + t3.score5) / 5 AS average_score from hairdresser_info t1 inner join services t2 on t1.no = t2.hairdresser_no inner join scores t3 on t1.no = t3.hairdresser_no group by t1.phone

select * from ( select t1.no, t1.name, t1.surname, t1.phone, t1.workingHour, t1.address, t1.storeImage, t1.profession, GROUP_CONCAT(t2.services) AS services, GROUP_CONCAT(t2.price) as price, GROUP_CONCAT(t2.color) as service_color, CONCAT_WS(',', t3.score1, t3.score2, t3.score3, t3.score4, t3.score5) AS scores, (t3.score1 + t3.score2 + t3.score3 + t3.score4 + t3.score5) / 5 AS average_score from hairdresser_info t1 inner join services t2 on t1.no = t2.hairdresser_no inner join scores t3 on t1.no = t3.hairdresser_no group by t1.phone ) myTable where myTable.phone = #{phone}
